Description.p: A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, a set of codes which represent personal sense of security, occurrence or threat of abuse, occurrence or threat of discrimination or unequal treatment.

Any code from the SNOMED CT UK SecurityAbuseDiscrimination subset with subset original id 6031000000130.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
